# Issue Templates

This directory contains templates for creating issues on Traderrr.

## Quick Guide

When creating an issue, GitHub will prompt you to choose a template:

| Template | Use When |
|----------|----------|
| **Bug Report** | Something isn't working |
| **Feature Request** | You want a new capability |
| **Documentation** | Docs need improvement |
| **Maintenance** | Technical debt or refactoring |
| **Blank** | Something else (any topic) |

## Creating an Issue

1. Go to **Issues** tab
2. Click **New Issue**
3. Click **Choose a template**
4. Fill in the template sections
5. Click **Submit new issue**

## Template Philosophy

Our templates are **lightweight by design**:
- ✅ Only capture what matters
- ✅ Not overwhelming
- ✅ Guide without forcing
- ✅ Support all issue types

**Key sections in every template:**
- **What**: Clear description of the issue
- **Why**: Context and motivation
- **How**: Steps, examples, or proposed approach
